column5: Can anyone on here give me info for contact information about this please. we own a seasonal property near Sioux Lookout on Minitakki and are wondering about this. we open our property up in mid may and close it up mid October. Thanks for any help!😊

All the info you need is here: https://www.canada.ca/en/revenue-age...Cxi4LU3yzkwli0 Most places will be exempt from paying the tax, there is a link on the page linked above to determine if your property is exempt. And even though you are exempt from the tax you still need to file. The deadline has been moved to Oct 31, 2023 to file the UHT.
i will be happy to take over ownership of any properties if one would like to avoid any fees keys will remain yours i will charge 1 week of occupancy for this service.
Scar, check your Private Messages. I have sent you all the info you will need.
Thanks BuckeyeATC and Sutsgold! this is what I needed😊
Great idea, especially if you attract 52 takers of your offer.
Regarding this process, does anyone know if you need an ITN tax number before sending in the UHT form?
